title: Input Validation and Output Formatting
description: Create a program that takes in a user's name and age as input. Validate the age to ensure it's within the range of 1 to 120. If the age is valid, output a greeting message with the user's name and age, formatted as 'Hello, {name}! You are {age} years old.' Otherwise, output an error message indicating that the age is invalid.
sample_output: Hello, John! You are 25 years old.
